hanzi-su-wiki:
刊

Значения

Издание, выпуск книги

Мнемоника

Печатать, ножом 刂 вырезая письмена, намазывая их краской и, плотно, как тараном 干, прижимая к ним бумагу.

Варианты

刋

kān

старый вариант 刊; очистить ножом; вырезать; внести изменения в; печатать; чтобы публиковать; публикация; периодическое издание; очистить ножом; вырезать; внести изменения в

(Trad.: 栞)
Pictophonetic: 干 indicates the sound; 刂 (knife) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
周刊 [ zhōu kān ]: weekly publication; weekly
副刊 [ fù kān ]: supplement
报刊 [ bào kān ]: newspapers and periodicals; the press
刊登 [ kān dēng ]: to carry a story; to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
刊物 [ kān wù ]: publication

heisig_chinese_memo: The newspaper pages are hung on the clotheseline to dry and then cut down with a sabre to be turned into a publication.
heisig_constituent: publish, dry, clothesline, sword, sabre, saber
koohiiStory1: The newspaper pages are hung on the clotheseline to dry and then cut down with a sabre to be published.
koohiiStory2: The newspaper pages are hung on the clotheseline to dry. This gives the government a chance to censor the news: they cut up unwanted stories with a sabre. Therefore, only state-approved stories are published.
jp_example_words:
刊行(かんこう): publication, issue
季刊(きかん): quarterly (e.g. magazine)
創刊(そうかん): launching (e.g. newspaper), first issue
夕刊(ゆうかん): evening paper
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You got your copy of "The Dry Knife." It's the newest edition of the magazine you love on keeping your knives dry.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You're really into this magazine, and when you heard there's a new edition of it, you went out and bought it right away.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: In this edition of "The Dry Knife," there is a huge article written by Genghis Khan (かん) on how he kept his knives dry while campaigning.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The article on Genghis Khan was perhaps the best written article in the Dry Knife series to date. How did this magazine get such a big interview?

Kanshudo_mnemonic: dry (干) your sword (刂) then publish
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The newspaper pages are hung on the clotheseline to dry and then cut down with a sabre to be turned into a publication.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " knife " to " dry " sound. The original meaning is to cut and cut. "Shuowen": "Publication, plucking it. From the knife, dry the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Everything that is cut off is the magazine." Interpretation III": "Journal, cut also." Such as "Shangshu. "Yiji": "I travel for four years, and follow the mountain to publish wood." "Zhou Li. Autumn official. "Zuo Shi": "Summer comes, so that the sun is published and the wood is fired; the winter is solstice, the peeling of the yin wood and the water." Zheng Xuan's note: "Publishing, peeling, and talking to each other, are all the peeling of the second place. "

" Journal " means sculpture. Such as "Selected Works. Ban Mengjian "Feng Yanran Mountain Inscription": "It is the Fengshan Kanshi, Zhao Ming Shengde." "Xijing Miscellaneous. Third": "And death, life is printed on the stone, buried in the side of the tomb." After engraving became popular, engraving on the plate was also called " Journal ." Modern Chinese also means typographical publication, as well as publications, such as "publications" and "monthly publications".

" Journal " means revision or amendment. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "The Biography of Zhang Cao Zheng": "Zheng Xuan includes a large collection of classics, covering all the families, cutting out complicated falsehoods, changing the publications and missing, it is what scholars know." Western Jin Dynasty Du Yu "Chun Qiu Zuo Shi Biography Preface": "Zuo Qiu Ming received experience Yu Zhongni thinks that the scriptures are not published."
humanum_short_description_en: From " sword " to " dry " sound. The original meaning is to cut and cut.
humanum_full_description:
從「刀」，「干」聲。本義是砍削、削除。《說文》：「刊，剟也。从刀，干聲。」段玉裁注：「凡有所削去謂之刊。」《廣雅．釋詁三》：「刊，削也。」如《尚書．益稷》：「予乘四載，隨山刊木。」《周禮．秋官．柞氏》：「夏日至，令刊陽木而火之；冬日至，令剝陰木而水之。」鄭玄注：「刊、剝，互言耳，皆謂斫去次地之皮。」

　　「刊」表示雕刻。如《文選．班孟堅〈封燕然山銘〉》：「乃遂封山刊石，昭銘盛德。」《西京雜記．第三》：「及死，命刊石，埋於墓側。」雕板印刷盛行後，在板上刻字也稱為「刊」。現代漢語還表示排印出版，又表示出版物，如「刊物」、「月刊」等。

　　「刊」表示修訂、修正。如《後漢書．張曹鄭列傳》：「鄭玄括囊大典，網羅眾家，刪裁繁誣，刊改漏失，自是學者略知所歸。」西晉杜預〈春秋左氏傳序〉：「左丘明受經於仲尼，以為經者不刊之書也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「刀」，「干」聲。本義是砍削、削除。

從「 刀 」，「 干 」聲。本義是砍削、削除。《說文》：「刊，剟也。从刀，干聲。」段玉裁注：「凡有所削去謂之刊。」《廣雅．釋詁三》：「刊，削也。」如《尚書．益稷》：「予乘四載，隨山刊木。」《周禮．秋官．柞氏》：「夏日至，令刊陽木而火之；冬日至，令剝陰木而水之。」鄭玄注：「刊、剝，互言耳，皆謂斫去次地之皮。」 「 刊 」表示雕刻。如《文選．班孟堅〈封燕然山銘〉》：「乃遂封山刊石，昭銘盛德。」《西京雜記．第三》：「及死，命刊石，埋於墓側。」雕板印刷盛行後，在板上刻字也稱為「 刊 」。現代漢語還表示排印出版，又表示出版物，如「刊物」、「月刊」等。 「 刊 」表示修訂、修正。如《後漢書．張曹鄭列傳》：「鄭玄括囊大典，網羅眾家，刪裁繁誣，刊改漏失，自是學者略知所歸。」西晉杜預〈春秋左氏傳序〉：「左丘明受經於仲尼，以為經者不刊之書也。」
From " knife" to " dry" sound. The original meaning is to cut and cut. "Shuowen": "Publication, plucking it. From the knife, dry the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Everything that is cut off is the magazine." Interpretation III": "Journal, cut also." Such as "Shangshu. "Yiji": "I travel for four years, and follow the mountain to publish wood." "Zhou Li. Autumn official. "Zuo Shi": "Summer comes, so that the sun is published and the wood is fired; the winter is solstice, the peeling of the yin wood and the water." Zheng Xuan's note: "Publishing, peeling, and talking to each other, are all the peeling of the second place. " " Journal" means sculpture. Such as "Selected Works. Ban Mengjian "Feng Yanran Mountain Inscription": "It is the Fengshan Kanshi, Zhao Ming Shengde." "Xijing Miscellaneous. Third": "And death, life is printed on the stone, buried in the side of the tomb." After engraving became popular, engraving on the plate was also called " Journal." Modern Chinese also means typographical publication, as well as publications, such as "publications" and "monthly publications". " Journal" means revision or amendment. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "The Biography of Zhang Cao Zheng": "Zheng Xuan includes a large collection of classics, covering all the families, cutting out complicated falsehoods, changing the publications and missing, it is what scholars know." Western Jin Dynasty Du Yu "Chun Qiu Zuo Shi Biography Preface": "Zuo Qiu Ming received experience Yu Zhongni thinks that the scriptures are not published."

刊字的基本解释

刊
kān
斫，消除，修改：刊误（亦作“勘误”）。校（ji刼 ）刊。不刊之论（喻至理名言）。
刻：刊石。刊印。刊本。
排版印刷：刊行（x妌g ）。创刊。刊登。刊载。
出版物：刊物。报刊。书刊。

：指刻、开辟、出版物。

Journal
kān
Zip, eliminate, modify: publication error (also referred to as "corrigendum"). School (ji 刼) journal. Non-published theory (Yu Zhili famous saying).
Engraved: published stone. Published. Publication.
Typesetting and printing: Publication (x妌g). Inauguration. Published. Published.
Publications: publications. press. Books.

: Fingerprint, development, publication.
kān
I гл.
1) вырезать (напр. клише), гравировать
刊字 гравировать письменные знаки
2) издавать, печатать, выпускать, публиковать
合刊 напечатать вместе (в одном издании)
停刊 прекратить выпуск, закрыть издание
刊章 опубликовать приказ
3) скоблить, стёсывать; соскабливать (напр. неправильный иероглиф); исправлять (текст)
刊柄 обтесать рукоятку
加刊窜 подвергнуть исправлению и переработке (литературное произведение)
4) рубить (дерево), уничтожать
刊木而火之 срубить дерево и сжечь его
井堙木刊 колодцы засыпаны и деревья уничтожены (срублены)
刊职 ликвидировать должность
II сущ.
печатное издание; выпуск
期刊 периодическое издание
月刊 ежемесячник
Radicals: 干, 刂  (dry, knife)
Meaning Mnemonic
You got your copy of "The Dry Knife." It's the newest edition of the magazine you love on keeping your knives dry.
You're really into this magazine, and when you heard there's a new edition of it, you went out and bought it right away.
Reading Mnemonic
In this edition of "The Dry Knife," there is a huge article written by Genghis Khan (かん) on how he kept his knives dry while campaigning.
The article on Genghis Khan was perhaps the best written article in the Dry Knife series to date. How did this magazine get such a big interview?

刈 (косить), 干 (сухой)
